content: I've said it before and I'll say it again...the NHLPA needs to wake up and have the reality check that they just don't have the numbers as a sport to support their egos.  The NHL is the 4th sport here in the US (where most of the revenue comes from, sorry Canada), and if they keep this kind of crap up, they'll end up behind MLS...very sad.

They may end up behind the WNBA.  I could care less where they end up, just so they get back out there and skate.  

Any chance of hiring scabs?   Remember that movie "Slapshot"?  Bring back the Hanson brothers!
